categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Alfi was a male Jedi Knight. In 40 ABY, whilst still a new Jedi Knight, Alfi was among those Jedi at the Ossus Academy when the Galactic Alliance Guard attempted to "secure" it, holding the students hostage. Alfi was in a cell when GAG major Salle Serpa moved against the Jedi, and was killed there by GAG forces.
